title: Brazil: Citibank Offers New Automatic Deposit Program at One of the Lowest Rates on the Market
summary: São Paulo - In accordance with Brazil's economic plan to stimulate borrowing through lower interest rates, Citibank is introducing a new program for automatic salary deposits at one of the lowest rates on the market.
tag-1: Brazil: Citibank Offers New Automatic Deposit Program at One of the Lowest Rates on the Market
tag-3: São Paulo – In accordance with Brazil's economic plan to stimulate borrowing through lower interest rates, Citibank is introducing a new program for automatic salary deposits at one of the lowest rates on the market.
tag-4: The new program will go into effect on June 1. Clients who choose to receive their salary via a Citibank checking account will be able to enjoy a range of benefits.
tag-5: Highlights of the program include lower interest rates for revolving lines of credit and personal loans, no interest for the first three months and a service package starting at R$17.45.
tag-6: "This Citi initiative will make our clients' lives easier by offering the same rate for revolving credit and personal loans," explained Leonel Andrade, head of consumer business at Citi Brazil, which incorporates Citibank and Credicard. "It's important to emphasize that Citi offers one of the best automatic salary deposit programs when compared with other private banks."
